official_title: A bill to promote the domestic recruiting of teachers for teaching positions in overseas dependents schools of the Department of Defense, and for other purposes.
short_title: Defense Department Overseas Teachers Act of 1979

summary.text: Defense Department Overseas Teachers Act of 1979 - Amends the Defense Department Overseas Teachers Pay and Personnel Practices Act regarding Department of Defense overseas dependents schools to limit the term of teaching positions and the travel and quarters allowance benefits for teachers who are recruited outside the United States. Provides exemptions from such limitations in specified teaching situations.
